title: metrics sharing
body:
Hi Brad,

This is indeed quite useful, and we also looked into this issue and find different library prep or exome capture method would give you different profile of coverage.

http://www.iscb.org/cms_addon/conferences/ismbeccb2013/posterlist.php?cat=N
Poster - N074

Do you think it's good to collect (or give people an option to share) this kind of data such that we could evaluate the capture/sequencing efficiency of different method for a subset of gene? This way, researchers interested in a subset of candidate gene (even when they are doing whole genome / whole exome sequencing), they could have something to evaluate / 'QC' their data.

Paul

title: Compile and generate jar file?
body:
Hi,

I am not familiar with Clojure. Could you give some instruction how to compile the project and make jar file out of it?
Thanks
